products.title: Apex Strat Pro Electric Guitar – Alder Body, Maple Neck
products.body_html:
The Apex Strat Pro Electric Guitar is built for players who want clarity, versatility, and smooth playability across multiple genres. Designed for both studio and stage use, it delivers a balanced tone that works equally well for clean blues, crunchy rock, and expressive lead playing.

Featuring a solid alder body paired with a maple neck, the Strat Pro offers bright articulation with a warm low end. The comfortable “C” neck profile makes it ideal for long playing sessions, while the responsive single-coil pickups provide dynamic range and touch sensitivity.

Whether you’re an intermediate guitarist upgrading your setup or an experienced player looking for a reliable workhorse, the Apex Strat Pro adapts to your style with ease. Its classic design and modern craftsmanship make it a dependable choice for everyday playing and performance.
products.tags: alder body, blues, electric guitar, funk, intermediate, live performance, maple neck, professional, rock, single coil, strat style, studio
